member.name: T:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1Ticket
member.summary: A Ticket represents a tracking record created in a work item database. For example, a microservice which has observed a low-priority condition that requires human interventions could create Ticket to be routed to the appropriate on-call staff. Is not intended to replace metric-based alerts for real-time notification.

member.name: F:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1Ticket.KubeApiVersion
member.summary: The API Version this Kubernetes type belongs to.

member.name: F:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1Ticket.KubeGroup
member.summary: The Group this Kubernetes type belongs to.

member.name: F:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1Ticket.KubeKind
member.summary: The Kubernetes named schema this object is based on.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1Ticket.Spec
member.summary: Spec contains the desired state of a work item that should be created in a related tracking database, e.g. GitHub Issues or AzureDevOps WorkItems.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1Ticket.Status
member.summary: Status contains the current state of the work item as it stands in the tracking database.

member.name: T:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketSpec
member.summary: Spec contains the desired state of a work item that should be created in a related tracking database, e.g. GitHub Issues or AzureDevOps WorkItems.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketSpec.ProviderClass
member.summary: ProviderClass must match the Metadata.Name of a TicketProvider in the cluster in order to be processed.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketSpec.Severity
member.summary: Severity is a system-specific value, e.g. high, low, or a string representation of a numeric value.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketSpec.Title
member.summary: Contains the summary of the issue that is being reported.

member.name: T:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketStatus
member.summary: Status contains the current state of the work item as it stands in the tracking database.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketStatus.UniqueId
member.summary: Unique ticket identifier assigned by provider backend system.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketStatus.WorkflowState
member.summary: A human-readable state value of the ticket determined by the work item tracking provider.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketStatus.WebUrl
member.summary: Browser location which may be used to navigate to ticket on the provider's user interface.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketStatus.ContactInfo
member.summary: Email address or other information to contact the person assigned to this ticket directly.

member.name: T:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProvider
member.summary: TicketProvider contains the configuration information for handling an class of Ticket resources. The Ticket.spec.providerClass property should match exactly one TicketProvider.metadata.name to be processed.

member.name: F:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProvider.KubeApiVersion
member.summary: The API Version this Kubernetes type belongs to.

member.name: F:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProvider.KubeGroup
member.summary: The Group this Kubernetes type belongs to.

member.name: F:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProvider.KubeKind
member.summary: The Kubernetes named schema this object is based on.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProvider.Spec
member.summary: Spec is the configured state of the provider. It includes the provider type and any provider-specific properties and connection credentials.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProvider.Status
member.summary: Status is the current state of the provider.

member.name: T:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpec
member.summary: Spec is the configured state of the provider. It includes the provider type and any provider-specific properties and connection credentials.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpec.Type
member.summary: Identifies which backend work item system tracking system is in effect. This imaginary example supports `azure` and `github` as the backend for ticket tracking.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpec.Azure
member.summary: Settings and credentials specific to the Azure DevOps work item tracking system.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpec.GitHub
member.summary: Settings and credentials specific to the GitHub issue tracking system.

member.name: T:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecAzure
member.summary: Settings and credentials specific to the Azure DevOps work item tracking system.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecAzure.Organization
member.summary: The Azure DevOps organization account name.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecAzure.Project
member.summary: The Azure DevOps project name used for Work Item tracking.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecAzure.AreaPath
member.summary: The Azure DevOps area path for ticket creation.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecAzure.SecretName
member.summary: The Kubernetes Secret metadata.name containing connection credentials.

member.name: T:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecGitHub
member.summary: Settings and credentials specific to the GitHub issue tracking system.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecGitHub.Organization
member.summary: The GitHub organiation name.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecGitHub.Repository
member.summary: The GitHub repository name used for Issue tracking.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderSpecGitHub.SecretName
member.summary: The Kubernetes Secret metadata.name containing connection credentials.

member.name: T:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderStatus
member.summary: Status is the current state of the provider.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderStatus.Online
member.summary: Online is `true` when the backend provider is configured correctly and connected.

member.name: P:UsingCustomResources.Models.V1alpha1TicketProviderStatus.Message
member.summary: When Online is `false` Message contains the most recent error description or exception message.
